医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究人员开发出预测乳腺癌患者免疫治疗反应的新方法约翰霍普金斯金梅尔癌症中心和约翰霍普金斯大学医学院的研究人员利用计算工具开发了一种方法来评估哪些转移性三阴性乳腺癌患者可以从免疫治疗中受益。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Researchers-develop-new-approach-to-predict-immunotherapy-response-in-breast-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Researchers-develop-new-approach-to-predict-immunotherapy-response-in-breast-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0f8c6a5f-eae5-42a4-b2b6-11195df2e9ab Tue, 29 Oct 2024 15:33:41 -0400 Researchers develop new approach to predict immunotherapy response in breast cancer patients
关于 1 型强直性肌营养不良症心脏缺陷的新见解强直性肌营养不良症 1 型 (DM1) 是最常见的成人发病形式的肌营养不良症，患者的小腿、手、颈部和面部的肌肉质量和力量会逐渐丧失。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/New-insights-into-cardiac-defects-in-Myotonic-Dystropy-Type-1.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/New-insights-into-cardiac-defects-in-Myotonic-Dystropy-Type-1.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5872c986-7441-418c-903c-c74df2f72ee8 Tue, 29 Oct 2024 15:26:20 -0400 New insights into cardiac defects in Myotonic Dystrophy Type 1
制定新建议以统一 sJIA 和 AOSD sJIA 和 AOSD 具有相同的特征，并且有相同的四个主要症状。然而，这两种情况传统上是根据诊断时的年龄来区分的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/New-recommendations-development-to-unify-sJIA-and-AOSD.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/New-recommendations-development-to-unify-sJIA-and-AOSD.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=adee7790-e733-4bf1-91af-ff81eac1886a Tue, 29 Oct 2024 14:58:00 -0400 New recommendations developed to unify sJIA and AOSD
家庭暴力被发现对健康产生严重的长期影响一项新的全球证据综合表明，家庭暴力与长期健康后果之间存在密切联系，对全世界数百万人的心理和身体健康产生了重大影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Family-violence-found-to-have-severe-long-term-health-effects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Family-violence-found-to-have-severe-long-term-health-effects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1bc4761e-ddc4-46f2-8006-b2a95274878b Tue, 29 Oct 2024 14:52:00 -0400 Family violence found to have severe long-term health effects
发现细胞在分裂过程中如何重组活细胞就像一座繁华的大都市，无数的分子和蛋白质在拥挤的空间中向各个方向移动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Discovering-how-cells-reorganize-during-division.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Discovering-how-cells-reorganize-during-division.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dbd4c346-bfee-48fa-bfbb-13306c915ab4 Tue, 29 Oct 2024 14:47:47 -0400 Discovering how cells reorganize during division
EUFIC发起运动促进全谷物消费欧洲食品信息理事会 (EUFIC) 很高兴在全谷物倡议的支持下发起转向全谷物运动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/EUFIC-launches-campaign-to-promote-whole-grain-conspiration.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/EUFIC-launches-campaign-to-promote-whole-grain-conclusion.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=83fc644d-8a1b-4115-829a-efbfee53c98a Tue, 29 Oct 2024 14:41:22 -0400 EUFIC launches campaign to promote whole grain consumption
基于微球封装肽的宫颈癌疫苗新方法HPV16 是一种高危人乳头瘤病毒 (HPV)，感染可导致人类宫颈癌。这些感染在全球女性中具有很高的发病和死亡风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/New-approach-for-cervical-cancer-vaccines-based-on-microsphere-encapsulated-peptides.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/New-approach-for-cervical-cancer-vaccines-based-on-microsphere-encapsulated-peptides.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=81d45698-5c0e-4d4f-af04-c332b6ae2c69 Tue, 29 Oct 2024 14:36:26 -0400 New approach for cervical cancer vaccines based on microsphere-encapsulated peptides
微小颗粒将热量和化疗结合输送到肿瘤晚期癌症患者通常必须忍受多轮不同类型的治疗，这可能会导致不必要的副作用，而且可能并不总是有帮助。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Tiny-articles-deliver-combined-heat-and-chemotherapy-to-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Tiny-articles-deliver-combined-heat-and-chemotherapy-to-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=684040dc-2d44-43b2-b394-0a308086c61d Tue, 29 Oct 2024 14:28:56 -0400 Tiny particles deliver combined heat and chemotherapy to tumors
床边跨学科查房改善患者和提供者的体验科罗拉多大学安舒茨医学校区的研究人员领导的一项研究表明，当整个医疗团队参与床边跨学科查房 (BIDR) 时，患者和提供者可以获得更积极的整体护理体验。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Bedside-intersubject-rounds-improve- Patient-and-provider-experiences.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Bedside-intersubject-rounds-improve- Patient-and-provider-experiences.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f271ede5-9909-4552-a0de-31180b146485 Tue, 29 Oct 2024 14:25:10 -0400 Bedside interdisciplinary rounds improve patient and provider experiences
高中酗酒与中年危险饮酒有关对于数量惊人的中年人来说，高中聚会的日子从未真正结束。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Binge-drinking-in-high-school-linked-to-risky-drinking-in-midlife.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Binge-drinking-in-high-school-linked-to-risky-drinking-in-midlife.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=05663c61-91ed-4ee3-b359-0d379e474064 Tue, 29 Oct 2024 14:17:40 -0400 Binge drinking in high school linked to risky drinking in midlife
